about_the_game:
Too kinky, too horny, and too hung for the big city, your CEO father sends you off to the countryside to avoid you causing a scandal. Little did your old man know that the thicc ladies out in the country are waiting for someone depraved enough to awaken their hidden slutty side, not even their own husbands have seen! Young, dumb, and full of cum, you set off around your new rural retreat and come upon Kyoko and Maika (the biggest bustiest MILFs you ever did see) and by a lewd twist of fate, it turns out their husbands are toiling away working at none other than one of your father's companies. Thus begins the corruption of a couple of wholesome housewives into cock hungry sluts!


  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • Both housewives are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • 20 scenes of awakening the latent lust within Maika and Kyoko!

Horny Housewives Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
